title: Understanding Digital Signatures
text: A digital signature is a way to ensure that an electronic document is authentic and has not been altered.

title: Components of a Digital Signature
text: Digital signatures use encryption to provide a secure way to verify the authenticity of a document.

hintAnswer: an electronic, encrypted, and secure stamp of authentication on a document
title: Purpose of Digital Signatures
text: What is the primary purpose of a digital signature?
choices: an electronic, encrypted, and secure stamp of authentication on a document
>a handwritten signature scanned into a computer
